meanings.definition: A telephone that can transmit and receive video images as well as audio signals.
meanings.sent1: My friend and I talked on our videophones and could see each other's faces.
meanings.sent2: We used videophones to have a video call with our family members who live far away.
meanings.sent3: The videophones made it feel like my friend was right in the room with me!
meanings.sent4: In a world of videophones, distance seems to disappear as we connect through screens.
meanings.sent5: The vivid images on the videophones made the conversation more engaging.
